name: GoalMaster!
description:
Drag and aim to determine the power and direction in which your ball will shoot! Utilise the environment in order to successfully score a goal and move onto the next challenge. Score as many goals as possible and beat the high score!

How many goals will you score?

GoalMaster! Features:

-Simple and satisfying controls
-Wacky physics!
-Get creative! multiple ways to complete a level!
-No IAP- GoalMaster! is a full game from the moment you download it!
